dji7HdGu.ja: ジェンダーに関するニュース

TAEHEVUh.en: June 24, 2022. US supreme court has ruled there is no constitutional right to abortion in the United States, upending the landmark Roe v Wade case.
TAEHEVUh.zh-Hans: 2022年6月24日，美国联邦最高法院发布裁决，正式推翻“罗诉韦德案”，结束宪法对堕胎权的保护。

no6weXhb.en: June 23, 2022. According to some netizens, a volunteer who tried to help the chained woman in Xuzhou, China has been sentenced to at least 8 months.
no6weXhb.zh-Hans: 2022年6月23日，据网友称，丰县铁链女事件中的“乌衣”因被以寻衅滋事罪名判刑至少8个月。
